channel.title: FoxCo Gaming Newsletter
channel.description: This is a gaming newsletter providing up to date information on gaming news

item.headline: Company of Heroes 2 is free right now!
item.author: Chrisom

item.headline: Fallout 76 - Better or Worse than ESO
item.description: We've taken a look at the upcoming game from Bethesda to decide, does it look like it'll unseat their current MMORPG or if the player base is just completely different.
item.author: Chrisom

item.headline: Command and Conquer - Due for a return?
item.description: It's been almost a decade since the last (good) game and we look at whether it's a time for Kane to return, or the Soviets to rise once more and bring this franchise back.
item.author: Chrisom

item.headline: Virtual Reality - Next best thing or Major flop?
item.description: We decided to take a look at the current VR headsets and work out whether they are worth the cost of buying them, or if they are just the next fad which will fade away
item.author: Chrisom

item.headline: Battlefield 5 - Is the return to WW2 right?
item.description: We've been looking over the latest details for battlefield 5 and we're trying to decide whether the return to World War 2 is the right move?
item.author: Chrisom

item.headline: GTA Online players - Friends or Foe?
item.description: When you go on GTA Online you'll always come across other players, but we decided to look at how often they turned out to be friendly.
item.author: Chrisom
